summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, accepting easements for fire hydrants and water meters with all appurtenances over portions of Pettit's Lake Washington Acre Tracts, "Chittenden's" "Terrace Park" and a portion of Section 16 Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M. (Watermain Replacement Program, Bothell Way N.E.).
